categories: Category:Conflicts of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: During the Cold War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic, a civil war broke out on the planet Livien. Rebel factions, backed by the Republic, rebelled against the Imperial-backed royal family, and the planet was thrown into chaos as a result.

The Livien civil war is mentioned in two separate and faction-specific Crew Skill missions in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. Republic players can have their companions complete the Underworld Trading mission "Overthrowing the Tyrants," which says that the rebels oust the royal family, while Imperial players can have their companions do the Underworld Trading mission "Quashing the Rebels," which claims that the royal family crushed the rebels.
